aspects.description: SkillShare Academy branding and color scheme consistently applied
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify purple-orange-cyan color palette is used throughout the application. Check for SkillShare Academy logo and branding elements on header/navigation.

aspects.description: Responsive design quality across different screen sizes
judgementScoreDescription: Poor responsive design with broken layouts on mobile/tablet or desktop-only functionality
Basic responsiveness with some layout issues on smaller screens but core functionality works
Good responsive design with proper layout adaptation across screen sizes and intuitive touch interactions
Excellent responsive design with optimal layouts for all devices, smooth transitions, and enhanced mobile user experience

aspects.description: Overall visual design quality and user interface consistency
judgementScoreDescription: Poor visual design with inconsistent styling, unclear navigation, and poor visual hierarchy
Basic design with some consistency but limited visual appeal and occasional usability issues
Good visual design with consistent styling, clear navigation, and appropriate use of visual elements
Excellent visual design with outstanding consistency, intuitive navigation, effective visual hierarchy, and polished aesthetics that enhance user experience

aspects.description: Page layout structure and navigation clarity
judgementScoreDescription: Poor layout structure with confusing navigation and unclear page organization
Basic layout with functional navigation but some areas lack clear organization or intuitive flow
Good layout structure with clear navigation patterns and logical page organization
Excellent layout with intuitive navigation, optimal page organization, and seamless user flow between sections

aspects.description: Login page with required form elements and validation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to login page, verify email input, password input, login button, registration link, and explanatory text are present. Check form validation for empty/invalid inputs.

options.description: One element missing or not validated
Two elements missing or not validated
Three elements missing or not validated
More than three elements missing  or not validated

aspects.description: Registration page with all required fields and validation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to registration page, verify name, email, password, confirm password fields are present. Test validation for email format, password strength, and matching passwords.

aspects.description: X-API token storage and persistence in localStorage
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Login successfully, check localStorage contains X-API token. Refresh page, verify user remains authenticated. Close and reopen browser, verify token persists.

aspects.description: Authentication redirects and protected route handling
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Access protected pages without login, verify redirect to login page. After successful login, verify redirect to dashboard. Test logout functionality clears authentication state.

aspects.description: Registration success flow and redirect to login
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Complete registration form with valid data, verify success message and automatic redirect back to login page.

aspects.description: Chart.js credit progress line chart implementation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to dashboard after login, verify credit earning progress chart displays as line chart showing last 30 days data. Chart should use Chart.js library and display credit accumulation over time.

aspects.description: Chart.js course completion doughnut chart implementation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: On dashboard, verify course completion status displays as doughnut chart showing completed vs remaining chapters across all enrolled courses using Chart.js.

aspects.description: Current credit balance and user statistics display
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Dashboard displays current user credit balance prominently, welcome message with user name, total enrolled courses count, and completed chapters count.

aspects.description: Course catalog display with all required information
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to course catalog, verify each course card displays title, description, difficulty level, total chapters, total credits available, and enrollment status indicator.

aspects.description: Search and filter functionality for courses
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Use search field to filter courses by title/description. Use difficulty filter (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced) to narrow course results. Verify filtering works correctly.

aspects.description: Course enrollment functionality with visual feedback
aspects.extraDescription: Test: For non-enrolled course, click 'Enroll' button, verify immediate enrollment and button changes to 'Continue Learning'. Enrolled courses should show 'Continue Learning' button that navigates to course page.

aspects.description: Individual course page with progress indicators
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to course page, verify course title/description, visual progress indicator showing completed/total chapters, and credit progress showing earned/possible credits.

aspects.description: Chapter listing with completion status and actions
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Course page displays all chapters with title, description, credit value (3-5 credits). Incomplete chapters show 'Mark as Completed' button, completed chapters show 'Chapter Completed' label and 'Share Achievement' button.

aspects.description: Chapter completion with credit addition and status update
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Click 'Mark as Completed' on incomplete chapter, verify credits added to user account, button changes to completion label with share button, and progress indicators update immediately.

aspects.description: Mentor session listing with all required information
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to mentor booking page, verify each session displays mentor name/expertise, disabled 'View Profile' button, session date/time, duration (1 hour), credit cost (8-15 credits), and 'Book Session' button.

aspects.description: Session booking with credit deduction and status change
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Click 'Book Session' on available session, verify credits deducted from user account, session status changes to 'Pending Confirmation', and booking appears in user's booked sessions list.

aspects.description: Real-time polling for booking confirmations every 30 seconds
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Book a session, verify status shows 'Pending Confirmation'. Wait 30 seconds and verify polling occurs (network request). Status should update when booking changes to 'confirmed' or 'rejected'.

aspects.description: Booked sessions display with status and session details
aspects.extraDescription: Test: After booking sessions, verify user's booked sessions list shows status (pending/confirmed/rejected), mentor name, date/time, and credit cost for each booking.

aspects.description: Comprehensive HTTP error handling with user-friendly messages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Trigger 400, 401, 403, 404, 422, and 500 errors by manipulating API calls. Verify each error displays appropriate user-friendly message and handles the error gracefully without breaking the application.

aspects.description: 401 Unauthorized error handling with redirect to login
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Make API call with invalid/expired token, verify 401 error automatically redirects user to login page and clears authentication state.

aspects.description: Framework-based SPA routing functionality
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate between pages using framework routing, verify URL updates correctly. Reload page at any route, verify same content displays as before reload (except unsaved inputs).

aspects.description: Modern JavaScript framework implementation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify application is built using a modern JavaScript framework (React, Vue, Angular, Svelte) with appropriate component structure and framework patterns.

aspects.description: LinkedIn Share Widget integration for chapter achievements
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Complete a chapter, click 'Share Achievement' button, verify LinkedIn share widget opens with course title, chapter name, credits earned, and user progress information populated correctly.

aspects.description: Real-time user interface updates and visual feedback
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Perform actions like enrollment, chapter completion, booking sessions. Verify immediate UI updates, progress indicators change, button states update, and user receives visual confirmation of actions.
